page.title: 08The History of Greenham Common Womens Peace Camp
page.content:
The Women's Peace Camp was established at Greenham Common Airbase in 1981 and undertook non-violent direction over ten years to remove the American Cruise Missiles, which finally left in 1991. The base has now been returned to common land.

The history of the Women's Peace Camp at USAF Greenham Common has been thoroughly documented at http://www.yourgreenham.co.uk
Contribution by: Ele
